domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @SenSchumer I have been working on the strategy for COVID-19 since before the news broke at the Presidents behest. I started out working on food ration boxes to mail to people not allowed to leave home & developed food based treatment, innoculation, & cure for COVID-19 along the way.
